group_1.textRight: Rise and shine.

group_1.textLeft: (It's that man...! This is... the former office of that scouting company, I believe...)
(Surrounded by... about 10 people... they're all his allies...)
(I could manage it, if I broke the handcuffs and @didn't mind killing him... [chara:301201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301201:cheek_0][chara:301201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]but...)

group_1.textRight: Not to rush things, but I want the phone number @of someone from the Blue Seas Family.
Preferably one of the bigshots, but anyone is fine.

group_1.textLeft: ...For what purpose have you restrained me?

group_1.textRight: You mean, why did we leave it at just restraining @you?
What the hell?!@Did you want me to stab you?
The reason you're only restrained is because you're @a hostage, or rather, bait.
There's a lot of hate and fury pointed our way, right?
If the Family's precious child is taken hostage, all of Blue Seas is gonna come after us.
Boom, we've got a trap!@We're free to shoot 'em all down!
Even if those idiots realize it's a trap, they'll still @jump into it.

group_1.textLeft: ...You think I'm going to tell you my number?

group_1.textRight: But you know what'll happen if you don't talk, right?@I'm sure you can.

group_1.textLeft: You know a lot about me and the Blue Seas Family.@You sound like a fan.
You must be feeling quite sore over how we crushed your scouting company!

group_1.textRight: Oh my God!@You don't even realize the trap you walked into!
That badge was secondhand, a memento of the corruption of the guys I got it from.

group_1.textLeft: No way, that badge...@you let it be taken on purpose...

group_1.textRight: Ding ding ding!
I knew a young lady so full of her sense of justice @and kung fu skills would come here alone.
You walked right into our trap!@Talk about perfect!
Actually, it would have worked out best if you had chased me back at the park...
Good thing I prepared some insurance.
Now that we're on the subject, let's talk motives, @shall we?
It only feels like a moment for an old guy like me,
but it was a long time ago for a child.
It's been three years...
That's right! We were thrown out after that @trumped-up investigation three years ago...
We're former cops from the Minaminagi Police Department.
We've got remnants of that smuggling ring too!
Hey!@Hurry and give us the number, damn it!

group_1.textLeft: Hey hey,@we don't need to get rough yet.
Let's play to her emotions.@You should have some sympathy for us.

group_1.textRight: Don't you feel bad for us?@We lost our jobs, our families fell apart...
I was just a good detective intent on destroying the Blue Seas, you know?
The Blue Seas Family are the ones in the wrong for @not letting me arrest them.
I may have used some morally gray means, but hey.
That's when the murder happened!@My big bro did it!
We all got so fired up!
If gray's no good, it's time to go black!@We're in the era of false convictions!
Well, the conviction was on a totally separate charge.
But if we got an arrest warrant with that separate charge, we could bust their door down!
We could've chipped away at them however we wanted... and yet...!
Somehow we're the ones that got arrested!
Perfectly fabricated evidence!@Perfect backroom deals with the judiciary!
When it was all said and done, we in the police department got treated as the bad guys with the trumped-up arrests!

group_1.textLeft: You say you were treated like bad guys...@as though you aren't actually bad...

group_1.textRight: And all the unlucky parties got disposed of!@On the other hand, the Blue Seas Family is still living peacefully today!
...It's like magic.
Magic? Fuck that!! Scary shit! Drop dead!

group_1.textLeft: And so! A guy like me who takes on such a horrifying foe must be an ally of justice!
For the sake of that justice those of us with power @have to get our hands dirty, it's the only way...

group_1.narration: Because of my wish back then...@these people lost their jobs...@they hate and fear us...
Is all of this my fault?
